title: Hellrider Longbow
content:
avenloft some years ago.

Longbow Two-Handed 18m

Hellrider Longbow is one of the Longbow Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. Hellrider Longbow is an enchanted bow that makes it very difficult for an enemy to hide or go invisible, it adds bonus to perception checks and has a chance to apply Faerie Fire on hit.
